/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++  CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/bvh.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/camera.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/hitable.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/hitable_list.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/material.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/src/sphere.cu.o CMakeFiles/path_tracer.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o path_tracer  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudart.so  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
